remarks: Deduction form of bound-variable hypothesis builder ~ nf3an . (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2016.)
statement:
nfand.1 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ps ) $.
nfand.2 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ch ) $.
nfand.3 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x th ) $.
nf3and $p |- ( ph -> F/ x ( ps /\ ch /\ th ) ) $.
